text: Must bring your own bag for your purchases because the mini-mart has started charging for carrier plastic bag, whatever the size.

Recently moved to the area and this family-run mini-mart is sure a hidden gem! It has almost everything that you need without going to the supermarket and their products are priced competitively. For the convenience of a store just a stone throw away, I'd rather purchase from Top Guan than to lug a bag of rice, detergent or fresh milk all the way from Jurong East!

This place is really rude and abides by silly rules...they claimed that paynow can't be used for low-value purchases because they have to pay the bank 60c for every paynow purchase....really? If that were true, are all of us paying 60c each time to pay our friends through paynow???
Scam shop. Everything is grossly over priced and asked to pay extra by using QR code payments. Beware at your own risk!
